title: "Mindless statistics and the 'null ritual'"

This is the website of the workshop *Mindless statistics and the "null ritual"*, part of the [STeW](https://uoelel.github.io/stew.html) series (Statistical Training Workshops) of the Linguistics and English Language department of the University of Edinburgh.

The slides are linked in the main menu and you can find data and code in the GitHub repository: <https://github.com/stefanocoretta/null-ritual>.
